instruction: List five benefits that come from playing sports.
output:
1. Improved physical health - Playing sports can help improve cardiovascular health, muscle and bone strength, and endurance.
2. Improved mental health - Research has found that playing sports can reduce stress, improve self-esteem, and enhance mood.
3. Improved interpersonal skills - Team sports involve the ability to work together, trust each other, and develop leadership qualities.
4. Improved emotional control - Learning how to cope with both wins and losses in sports, as well as upholding fair play, can help develop better emotions control.
5. Fun and enjoyment - Playing sports is a great way to relax and have fun, making it a great source of enjoyment and entertainment.
